text: James Bradley McLeod (April 8, 1937 – May 18, 2019) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey goaltender. McLeod started his career with the St. Louis Blues in the National Hockey League during the 1972. Later in his career he played in the World Hockey Association for the Chicago Cougars, Los Angeles Sharks, Michigan Stags, and New York Golden Blades. ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:International Hockey League (1945–2001) players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:St. Louis Blues players Category:World Hockey Association players
title: Jimmy McLeod
